title: How mute button will work at tonight's Biden-Trump debate
content: Behind the podiums, there will be two green lights which are a signal for the microphones. When the lights are off, the microphone is mute. When a candidate speaks, the microphone of the other remains off and at that time if the second one interrupts the first one, his voice will not reach the viewers -- he will only be seen miming. But as they are be standing at lecterns that are only 8 feet apart, they will hear each other, even if on mute.
summary: Behind the podiums, there will be two green lights which are a signal for the microphones. When the lights are off, the microphone is mute. When a candidate speaks, the microphone of the other remains off and at that time if the second one interrupts the first one, his voice will not reach the viewers -- he will only be seen miming. But as they are be standing at lecterns that are only 8 feet apart, they will hear each other, even if on mute.

Bolivia coup bid fails after short-lived military assault on presidential palace
content: The failed coup attempt in Bolivia revealed deep-seated issues of economic struggle and political unrest, showcasing the challenges faced by the military in upholding political orders. The incident underscored the fragility of democracy in the country amidst ongoing turmoil.
summary: The failed coup attempt in Bolivia revealed deep-seated issues of economic struggle and political unrest, showcasing the challenges faced by the military in upholding political orders. The incident underscored the fragility of democracy in the country amidst ongoing turmoil.

title: Washington DC of today too hot for Lincoln: Wax statue melts, turns into a meme
Court upholds Imran, wife's jail sentences in illegal-marriage case
content: A court in Islamabad rejected former Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife Bushra Bibi's appeal to suspend their sentences for violating Islamic marriage laws. They were sentenced to seven years in jail for marrying before Bushra Bibi's iddat period ended. Imran's party condemned the verdict and plans to appeal. Imran, battling multiple charges, remains jailed since August last year.
summary: A court in Islamabad rejected former Prime Minister Imran Khan and his wife Bushra Bibi's appeal to suspend their sentences for violating Islamic marriage laws. They were sentenced to seven years in jail for marrying before Bushra Bibi's iddat period ended. Imran's party condemned the verdict and plans to appeal. Imran, battling multiple charges, remains jailed since August last year.

title: Woman compared to Hawk Tuah girl for ice-cream video. Then this happened
content: TikTok now announced that a new Hawk Tuah girl has come and is waiting to take over the Internet. The woman was seen having ice cream with her friend at a live match. The video went viral from the live telecast of the match by a channel. The woman slammed the trend and hit out at the channel for sexualizing her video. She said she was getting compared to the Hawk Tuah girl - implying no offence to her.
summary: TikTok now announced that a new Hawk Tuah girl has come and is waiting to take over the Internet. The woman was seen having ice cream with her friend at a live match. The video went viral from the live telecast of the match by a channel. The woman slammed the trend and hit out at the channel for sexualizing her video. She said she was getting compared to the Hawk Tuah girl - implying no offence to her.

title: Who is Maldives minister who performed 'black magic' on President Muizzu?
content: ​Fathimath Shammaz Ali Saleem, the environment minister of Maldives, was arrested for allegedly performing black magic on President Mohamed Muizzu. She was also suspended from her post following her arrest. Police have not officially confirmed the 'black magic' part but they said they were investigating a case involving Shamnaz and two other individuals.
summary: ​Fathimath Shammaz Ali Saleem, the environment minister of Maldives, was arrested for allegedly performing black magic on President Mohamed Muizzu. She was also suspended from her post following her arrest. Police have not officially confirmed the 'black magic' part but they said they were investigating a case involving Shamnaz and two other individuals.

title: US supreme court ruling allows abortions in Idaho for medical emergencies
content: ​​The 6-3 decision, with three conservative justices dissenting, temporarily reinstated a lower court's ruling that Idaho's near-total abortion ban, which is backed by Republicans, must give way to the Emergency Medical Treatment and Labor Act (EMTALA) of 1986 when the two laws are in conflict.
summary: ​​The 6-3 decision, with three conservative justices dissenting, temporarily reinstated a lower court's ruling that Idaho's near-total abortion ban, which is backed by Republicans, must give way to the Emergency Medical Treatment and Labor Act (EMTALA) of 1986 when the two laws are in conflict.

Polling expert Nate Silver predicts high chances for Donald Trump win in 2024 presidential polls
content: Nate Silver's forecast favors Trump for the 2024 election, urging strategic decisions for Biden. Silver's accuracy history prompts scrutiny on Democratic strategies and potential convention changes for Biden's campaign.
summary: Nate Silver's forecast favors Trump for the 2024 election, urging strategic decisions for Biden. Silver's accuracy history prompts scrutiny on Democratic strategies and potential convention changes for Biden's campaign.

title: Human remains found near missing Texas student’s apartment
content: Harris, a student at Texas A&M University – Corpus Christi, disappeared on March 4 while walking near his apartment complex in the early morning hours.
summary: Harris, a student at Texas A&M University – Corpus Christi, disappeared on March 4 while walking near his apartment complex in the early morning hours.

title: 'Why Muslim dish names': Indian man recounts experience in Vienna restaurant
content: An Indian man posted a long thread on X recounting his experience at an Indian restaurant in Vienna where a group of Indians asked the owner why there were Mughal paintings and why they had 'Muslim dish' names. As the post went viral, a user wrote: "So, u r saying German and others should love it if I open a "German restaurant" and put up the large paintings of Hitler there?"
summary: An Indian man posted a long thread on X recounting his experience at an Indian restaurant in Vienna where a group of Indians asked the owner why there were Mughal paintings and why they had 'Muslim dish' names. As the post went viral, a user wrote: "So, u r saying German and others should love it if I open a "German restaurant" and put up the large paintings of Hitler there?"

title: Has Donald Trump support increased in Black, Hispanic voters after his mugshot?
content: "Since [the mugshot] happened, the support among the Black community and the Hispanic community has skyrocketed," Trump said. "It has been amazing, really been amazing."
summary: "Since [the mugshot] happened, the support among the Black community and the Hispanic community has skyrocketed," Trump said. "It has been amazing, really been amazing."

title: Why US Air Force fired top program manager for next-gen ‘Sentinel’ missiles
content: The US Air Force has removed Colonel Charles Clegg, the official in charge of the development of the next-generation ‘Sentinel’ intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM). This missile is set to replace the aging Minuteman III, a crucial component of the United States' nuclear triad, originally deployed in the 1970s.
summary: The US Air Force has removed Colonel Charles Clegg, the official in charge of the development of the next-generation ‘Sentinel’ intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM). This missile is set to replace the aging Minuteman III, a crucial component of the United States' nuclear triad, originally deployed in the 1970s.
